text: One drop may refer to: * One Drop Foundation, a non-profit organization that advocates for equal access to water * Big One for One Drop, a poker tournament featuring the largest buy-in events * One drop rhythm, a rhythmic pattern used in reggae music and related styles * One-drop rule, a law in the south of the USA before the USA Civil War that stated that a person with any African ancestry was considered black ==Songs== * "One Drop" (Bob Marley & The Wailers song) * "One Drop" (KAT-TUN song) * "One Drop", a 2012 single by Public Image Ltd. * "One Drop", a song by Plumb on Need You Now (Plumb album)
title: One drop
